But if I had to choose, here's what I'd do:

wonderful - dharma
best - dharma
superb - dharma
excellent - dharma
terrible - church (only because it sounds like something you might say about a bad experience at a church)
awful - church (same reason as above)
worst - church (ditto)
horrible - church (you get the idea)

Let me know what this is for, babe!
